name: Vinay Gangidi
bio: Vinay Gangidi is a senior technology leader specializing in n8n-based automation and AI-driven workflow orchestration. He builds intelligent, self-hosted workflows using n8n, LLM-powered agents, Python, and Azure AI to eliminate manual work across GTM, product development, finance, legal, business operations, HR, revenue operations, and compliance, with a strong focus on governance and real business impact.
